root.name: Crimson Room: Reverse
root.description: OverviewCrimson Room: Reverse is a puzzle/adventure game developed by Takagism and published by both Agetec (US version) and Success Corp. (Japanese version) for the PSP platform.A compilation of eight puzzle rooms based on a series of Flash games.Crimson RoomViridian RoomBlue ChamberWhite ChamberCrimson Room ReverseViridian Room ReverseBlue Chamber ReverseWhite Chamber Reverse
